description: The project seeks to engage men as partners in promoting gender equality and prevention of gender-based violence.

subproject.description: The first step of this project is to conduct a formative research with men in selected districts, on the links between gender and masculinity, sexuality and health risks using gender equitable men scale (GEM). The second stage- Training-of-Trainers and establishment of focal points while the third stage will consist of a set of advocacy events at national and decentralized levels.
subproject.gender code: Gender Equality as a principal objective
subproject.title: Engaging men as partners in pr
